pageTitle: Thomson Holidays - Hotel Regente in Benidorm
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {24564=Just got home 21st July and can't wait to go back...11 of my family and friends stayed here and I personally can not fault this hotel....upgraded to all inclusive which is well worth the money...5 * hygiene rating it's immaculate. Very friendly staff and entertainment is great although I am gutted am not there to see dirty dancing this week ð..... Thanks for making our stay an enjoyable one regente...More, 28596=Stayed with my wife and 12 yr old son from 26 June for 1 week full board and had a great time. Clean rooms and pool area, good choice of food, I especially enjoyed the paella for lunch and also the gala dinner on the Friday when they provide free cava! Friendly polite staff and reasonably priced drinks, nothing to complain about at all. Would come back no problem.More, 25910=Just back today july 19th stayed at hotel with family for a week. Have stayed at many hotels in benidorm but this one is best so far can not fault in any way. Check in was quick and plus where in two rooms but on different floors and he moved us to rooms next door. All staff was so friendly and cleaners done rooms every day and swiming pool brill and food everything just excellant. Will defo be back .More, 24041=tasha1717, Leicester, United Kingdom, 31051=Can't find the excursion you're looking for? Call us on 0871 2314 289 and we'll be happy to help. Calls cost 10p per minute…}

textAfterTable: SUSTAINABLE TOURISM TRAVELIFE GOLD Travelife Gold is awarded to hotels that demonstrate industry-leading sustainability practice. In other words, properties that are both greener and fairer to the environment, their employees and local communities. TripAdvisor Reviews Show more reviews » Fantastic Hotel Sat Jul 25 00:00:00 BST 2015 Just got back from a 10 night stay here & really enjoyed it. All staff are friendly, the hotel is clean & maids clean/change beds every day. The swimming pool is not massive so can get busy on peak days but we always managed to find a sunbed, there is also a smaller pool for young ones. We never stayed for the entertainment, but often heard/saw bits of it as we were heading out. I believe they have a mini disco for the kids and then a different act each night. One of the best things about the hotel is the food - there are different themes every night, Chinese night, Italian night etc...one night they even had a chocolate fountain! I had stayed at other hotels in Benidorm & these had the best
